body.p: Neutral wires must be twice the size of phase cables. Neutral and ground busbars have two-hole compression lug connections. Holes can be 3/8" dia. or 1/2" dia. ().
Location of busbars depends on customer’s top or bottom cable exit.
Solid plate is provided at the bottom or top of the main cabinet or side car for cable exit. Customers must execute their own cut-outs for solid plate cable exit trays.
